summary: In recent years, I have started enjoying video essays on YouTube, which was a genre of video I did not previously care for.  I always thought they were too long, or too extensive, or just over topics I didn’t really care about.  One of the channels that changed this for me is Shaun...
title: What You Should Be Watching: YouTube Edition: Shaun

summary:
The title of this post makes it sound like I’m buying new PCs every five minutes, which is not the case, but I really couldn’t think of a better title, so here we are.  I’ve not posted for months at this point, so gimme a break won’t you. 
First things
title: The first apps I install on every new PC
